channel.desc: Diamonique is the finest simulated diamond in the world. In this show we present a range of rings, earrings and pendants to help you find the perfect present for a loved one - or a treat for yourself.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ninja Cooking Appliances
channel.desc: From blending up ingredients to whipping up tasty meals, Ninja helps you prepare delicious, healthy food in your own kitchen. Showcasing their range of innovations, you won't want to miss this show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tarte Cosmetics
channel.desc: This show features high performance natural products from Tarte Cosmetics, including everything from Amazonian clay to maracuja oil. Find a wide variety of glamorous eco-chic products you'll love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.
